resources.string: Apne naye customers ko aasani se jodein!
Kya aap is ko wakai me hatana chahate hain?
Aap ise menu bar me se fir se jod sakte hain.
Transaction nahi jod saktein. Kripaya fir se try karein
Customer nahi jod saktein. Kripaya fir se try karein
Kshama karein, kuch takaniki samasya aa gayi hai. Kripaya thodi der baad fir se koshish karein.
Kul bakaya aur vasooli ki sumarry yahaan dekhein.
Ab, kisi bhi grahak par sirf 2 click mein transaction jodein
Aapke phone me installed baki online/ digital bahi-khata app se account statement ka PDF OkCredit par upload karein.
Customer, transaction records, etc. jodein. Aapke records kisi bhi agency ke saath share nahi kiye jayenge.
App Security PIN Update kiya gaya
OkCredit aapko aashwasan deta hai ki, aapki anumati ke bina,
Hum aapke account ki jaankari share nahi kartein.
Hum aapke bank account/ financial jaankari share nahi kartein.
Hum aapki jaankari delete ya edit nahi kartein.
Aap aur doosri party svatantra roop se ya ek saath account maintain kar sakte hain!
Aap dono bhi transactions ko add/ edit ya delete kar sakte hain.
Ek dusre ko block kar ke aap dono bhi swatantra account maintain kar sakte hain.
Record kiye gaye saare transactions ke baare me hum SMS update bhejte hain. Agar aap chahein to, grahak ke page par settings me jakar ise badal sakte hain
Aap dusri party ko SMS ya WhatsApp dwara updates bhej sakte hain

Train me yatra karte samay mera phone kho gaya tha aur mujhe apne data ko lekar chinta ho rahi thi. 15 dinon baad maine naye phone se fir se login kiya aur 15 dinon ke baad bhi mujhe apna purana data bina koi entry khoye waapas mil gaya. OkCredit ka dhanyawaad!
Aapke account ki jaankari online save hoti hai, jo aapke mobile number se link hoti hai
Aapke account ki jaankari online save hoti hai, jo aapke mobile number se link hoti hai.
Apne Account ki sabhi Jaankari download karein
Apne account ka data & access surakshit rakhein
Kewal vishwasneey logon ko hi access ki anumati dein
Suchana: OkCredit aapki madad ke liye WhatsApp par 24x7 uplabdh hai!\nSawaal poochhne ke liyeyahaan dabaayein
OkCredit ke baare me adhik jaanane ke liye hamaariPrivacy policyaurTerm of usepadhein
Apne registered mobile number selogin karein
Aapka data aapko Waapas Mil Jaayega!
Apne account ki jaankari aasani se download karein
OkCredit ke baare me adhik jaanein
Kya OkCredit mere data ka use karta hai?
OkCredit kisi bhi user ke data ka use ya uska misuse nahi karta. OkCredit app par aapke anubhav ko behtar banane ke liye hum kewal users ke pattern dekhte hain.
Kya OkCredit mera data kisi ke saath share karta hai?
Ji nahi, OkCredit aapki anumati ke bina aapka data kisi bhi sarkari, gair-sarkari vyakti ya sanstha ke saath share nahi karta.
Mera data online kyon rakha jaata hai?
Aapka data online isliye rakha jaata hai taaki aapka phone gum jaane ya kharab ho jaane par use aap hi ke naye phone par recover kiya ja sake.
Kya mere data ko koi internet par dekh sakta hai?
Kabhi nahi, OkCredit aapke data ko safe rakhne ke liye sabse behtareen technology ka istemal karta hai aur bina aapki anumati ke ise internet par aapke alawa koi nahi dekh sakta.

Kya aap bhaasha badal kar
%1$s karna chahte hain? Haan, Abhi Badlein
Neeche diye gaye customer ko SMS ya WhatsApp dwara online payment ke liye ek collection reminder bheja jayega
Collection reminder bhejne ke liye kripaya, customers chunein
Aapke supplier ke saath hue transactions record karein
%s dwara kiya gaya payment transaction me joda jayega.
Bank Details ki Request ki gayi
Ab accounting aapki jeb me. Customer jod kar aaj hi apna digital bahikhata shuru karein.
payment ka anurodh kar rahe hain
Customer section me le jaane ke liye yahaan tap karein
Supplier section me le jaane ke liye yahaan tap karein
